name: Version 8.11.2 (docs only)
body: This is another docs-only release. It fixes an issue with ReadTheDocs, and doesn't contain any code changes. There is no corresponding version on PyPI.

name: Version 8.11.1 (docs only)
body: This is a docs-only release incorporating PR #577. It fixes an issue with ReadTheDocs, and doesn't contain any code changes. There is no corresponding version on PyPI.

name: Version 7.0.0
body: See [the release notes](https://github.com/erikrose/more-itertools/blob/7fcf148de6482484298796553fccbf9ccfd31516/docs/versions.rst) for the full list of changes.

name: Version 6.0.0
body:
This is the first Python 3-only release.

Python 2 users may use [version 5.0.0](https://github.com/erikrose/more-itertools/releases/tag/5.0.0).

See [the release notes](https://github.com/erikrose/more-itertools/blob/e36eeebc9d01d2dbbe232880741e88585a95bf7d/docs/versions.rst#600) for the full list of changes.

name: Pseudo-version 4.3.1
body: This is [version 4.3.0](https://github.com/erikrose/more-itertools/releases/tag/4.3.0) plus PR #226 . There is no corresponding PyPI release; this is just to fix the docs on RTD.
